verses.name: Ezekiel 48:26
verses.text: And by the border of Issachar, from the east side unto the west side, Zebulun a portion.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:27
verses.text: And by the border of Zebulun, from the east side unto the west side, Gad a portion.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:28
verses.text: And by the border of Gad, at the south side southward, the border shall be even from Tamar unto the waters of strife in Kadesh, and to the river toward the great sea.

verses.name: Ezekiel 48:29
verses.text: This is the land which ye shall divide by lot unto the tribes of Israel for inheritance, and these are their portions, saith the Lord God.
